Reviews.Title: More than what I expected
Reviews.Author: JPRuiz
Reviews.Content: So this laptop comes with Windows 8, which I'd heard is a complete nightmare.  I was honestly expecting a bit of frustration when I started using the computer, based on this fact.  Trust me, a few minor tweaks (including upgrading to Windows 8.1) and I've had nothing but smooth sailing.  The computer is extremely fast, extremely useful.  It is very light (weight), and the battery lasts enough for you to complete any task you might need (4+ hours).  Great picture quality.  In few words...great performance all around.  So far, found no reason to complain.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 3230M 2.6 GHz
8 GB DDR3
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, Intel HD Graphics 4000
Windows 8, 4.8-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ATIV Book 2 NP270E5G-K04US 15.6-Inch Laptop (Mineral Ash Black)
